title: 2. SCOPE OF COVER
sample_text:
It is an all risk cover for crops right from its sowing stage to 
harvesting subject to the exclusions mentioned in the Policy 
Wordings.

title: 3. EXCLUSIONS
sample_text:
3.1 	 The Company shall not be liable to make any payment 
under this Policy in connection with or in respect of any 
expenses whatsoever incurred arising out of damage or 
loss to insured Crop arising from:
•
The burning of the property by order of any public
authority or subterranean fire.
•	
Fire during harvest including but not limited to spark 
originating from engine exhaust and/or other hot 
machinery parts on harvesters and/or tractors.
•
Malicious, willful act or gross negligence of the
Insured or any of his representative(s) or employee(s).
•
Consequential loss whether or not caused

title: 16.	 Cancellation/termination:
sample_text:
The Insured can cancel the policy at any time during the 
policy term, by informing the Company.  The Company can 
cancel the policy only on the grounds of established 
fraud, by giving minimum notice of 7 days to the Insured. 
The Company shall refund proportion premium for 
unexpired policy period subject to no claim(s) made during 
the policy period..
